snippet.title: Bavovna included! v.2.0 [TRAILER]
snippet.description:
We have finally finished working on a huge update!
As promised, we have been diligently working to improve our overall game and bring us closer to our ultimate victory!

You can still purchase the game on Steam! Thank you for everything! 

We have decided to change the foundation to which we donate a percentage of our sales because we trust these people.

Support Ukraine and support our crew!
